articles.description: Auto giant Maruti Suzuki has held a strong rally for ten days straight. Notably, Maruti has made a significant upside since its market debut in July 2003, with a four-digit upside in percentage terms.
articles.content: Bulls are roaring in auto giant Maruti Suzuki stock price for ten consecutive days, making it the longest gaining streak ever since it debuted on the exchanges. On Tuesday, Maruti held over 9,000 mar… [+6012 chars]

articles.title: Tata And IndiGo Prepare To Swoop On Go Air's Aviation Assets: Report - NDTV
articles.description: India's biggest conglomerate and largest airline are in talks to take Airbus SE planes from Go Airlines India Ltd. after the carrier filed for insolvency protection and was ordered to stop selling tickets.
